# tf.gfile.DeleteRecursively


<table class="tfo-notebook-buttons tfo-api" align="left">

<td>
  <a target="_blank" href="https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.15/tensorflow/python/lib/io/file_io.py#L546-L556">
    <img src="https://www.tensorflow.org/images/GitHub-Mark-32px.png" />
    View source on GitHub
  </a>
</td></table>



Deletes everything under dirname recursively.

### Aliases:

* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/gfile/DeleteRecursively"><code>tf.compat.v1.gfile.DeleteRecursively</code></a>


``` python
tf.gfile.DeleteRecursively(dirname)
```



<!-- Placeholder for "Used in" -->


#### Args:


* <b>`dirname`</b>: string, a path to a directory


#### Raises:


* <b><a href="/api_docs/python/tf/errors/OpError"><code>errors.OpError</code></a></b>: If the operation fails.
